sage.ai.behaviortrees

Class BTAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.ai.behaviortrees.BTBehavior
      • sage.ai.behaviortrees.BTAction

  • public abstract class BTAction
extends BTBehavior
    BTAction represents an action behavior node in a behavior tree. All this class does is sets the nodes BTNodeType to ACTION. Users wanting to create their own action behaviors extend this class.
    Author:
    Kenneth Barnett, Alex J. Champandard
    See Also:
    Behavior Trees Tutorial Video

    Behavior Trees Starter Kit
